Package io.mani.restfullapp.course.topics

Class CourseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mani.restfullapp.course.topics.CourseService
  • @Service
public class CourseService
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is a what called in spring boot business service when the application starts spring make an instance from this service and register that instance. then we can use this business service inside other classed or controllers
